channel.title: Skilling area- Please help!
channel.description:
I've tried and tried to add a skilling area into my server but nothings working! I made the object and added the case but still wont let me click it! heres the codes I used, [code] makeGlobalObject(2785, 2778, 2565, -3, 10); // silver stall[/code] That is the code I used to add the object. Now, Yes that did add the silver stall but it wouldnt let me train Thieve so I added this.
[code] case 2565: TheifStall("silver stall", "and recieve 25k", 80, 300 * playerLevel[17], 995, 25000, 5, 0x340); break;[/code]
Now this wont work still! Please post codes for a skilling area! I will appreciate it completely and give you 99% credit and me 1% credit for adding it I will also give you any amount of any item that you want on my server for life. No staff items! I will provide a set of mod gear to you as it is custom items.
Thanks for helping if you can.

The class code I posted isnt doing anything
